svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

version="26.1.1"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="SIIEOCIIjY8nbPnI2MpK"> <mxGraphModel dx="749" dy="508" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-1" value="User applications" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;glass=0;shadow=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="79.26829268292684" y="10" width="199.14634146341467" height="41.11111111111111" as="geometry" /> as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-5" value="Layer 6<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>Presentation" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;glass=0;shadow=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="79.26829268292684" y="92.22222222222221" width="199.14634146341467" height="41.11111111111111" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-6" value="Layer 5<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>Session" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;glass=0;shadow=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="79.26829268292684" y="133.33333333333331" width="199.14634146341467" height="41.11111111111111" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-7" value="Layer 4<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>Transport" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;glass=0;shadow=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="79.26829268292684" y="174.44444444444443" width="199.14634146341467" height="41.11111111111111" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-8" value="Layer 3<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>Network" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;glass=0;shadow=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="79.26829268292684" y="215.55555555555554" width="199.14634146341467" height="41.11111111111111" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-9" value="Layer 2<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>Data Link" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="79.26829268292684" y="256.66666666666663" width="199.14634146341467" height="41.11111111111111" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-10" value="Layer 1<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>Physical" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="79.26829268292684" y="297.77777777777777" width="199.14634146341467" height="41.11111111111111" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-11" value="Transmission media" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;glass=0;shadow=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="79.26829268292684" y="338.88888888888886" width="199.14634146341467" height="41.11111111111111" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-14" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-10"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="330.36585365853665" y="273.1111111111111" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="318" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-16" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#7EA6E0;strokeWidth=3;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="79.26829268292684" y="256.66666666666663" width="199.14634146341467" height="82.22222222222221" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-17" value="<font style="color: rgb(126, 166, 224); font-size: 14px;"><b style="">Ethernet</b></font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="285.44444444444446" width="51.95121951219513" height="24.666666666666664" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-18" value="<font style="font-size: 10px;">Defines how data is transmitted as electrical, optical, or radio signals over physical media (e.g., copper cables, fiber, radio waves)</font><div><b><font style="font-size: 10px;">&gt; Bit-level transmission</font></b></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="323.68" y="306" width="319.32" height="24.67" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-19" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="278.41463414634154" y="276.8111111111111" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="277" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-20" value="<font style="font-size: 10px;">Ensures â€‹reliable data transfer between devices <b>within the same network (LAN)</b></font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="323.68" y="264.89" width="359.32" height="24.67" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-22" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" target="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-23"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="689" y="277" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="709" y="250" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-23" value="Logic Link Control (LLC)" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;glass=0;shadow=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="718.9982926829268" y="236.11" width="199.14634146341467" height="41.11111111111111" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-24" value="Media Access Control (MAC)" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="718.9982926829268" y="277.2211111111111" width="199.14634146341467" height="41.11111111111111" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-26" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" target="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-24"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="689" y="277" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="719" y="260" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-27" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#7EA6E0;strokeWidth=3;glass=0;shadow=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="719" y="280" width="199.15" height="38.34" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-28" value="<span style="font-size: 10px;">- <b>Physical addressing</b>: identifies devices using its unique MAC address</span><div><span style="font-size: 10px;">- <b>Access control</b>:&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 10px;">avoids collisions in shared networks</span></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;strokeColor=#E6E6E6;strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;glass=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="929" y="285.44" width="359.32" height="33.17" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-29" value="<span style="font-size: 10px;">- <b>Error control </b>(e.g., CRC): enables to&nbsp;detect/correct frame errors</span><div><span style="font-size: 10px;">- <b>Flow control</b>: ensures Receiver has enough space to receive Sender's data</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10px;">- <b>Multiplexing</b>: allows&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 10px;">multiple network protocols to share the same physical link</span></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;strokeColor=#E6E6E6;strokeWidth=1;glass=1;shadow=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="929" y="230" width="359.32" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-30" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="278.41463414634154" y="235.70111111111106" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="235.89" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-31" value="<span style="font-size: 10px;">Establishes communications across <b>different networks</b>:</span><div><span style="font-size: 10px;">- Logical addressing: assigns unique IP addresses to devices</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10px;">- Routing: finds the best path&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 10px;">for data to travel between source and destination</span></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="323.68" y="224.45" width="359.32" height="36.22" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-32" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="278.41463414634154" y="194.59111111111105" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="194.77999999999997" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-33" value="<span style="font-size: 10px;">Provides end-to-end error recovery mechanisms as well as flow control</span><div><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 10px;"><b>- TCP</b> (Transmission Control Protocol) for accurate communication;</span></div><div><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 10px;"><b>- UDP</b> (User Datagram Protocol) for fast communication</span></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="323.68" y="176.89" width="359.32" height="36.22" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-34" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="279.41463414634154" y="153.48111111111103" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="321" y="153.66999999999996" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-35" value="<span style="font-size: 10px;">Manages and control <b>connections</b> (ie, sessions) between applications</span>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="324.68" y="135.77999999999997" width="359.32" height="36.22" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-36" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="279.04463414634154" y="112.37111111111103" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="320.63" y="112.55999999999996" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-37" value="<span style="font-size: 10px;">Ensures data sent by one application can be</span><span style="font-size: 10px;">&nbsp;(1)</span><span style="font-size: 10px;">&nbsp;correctly <b>interpreted</b> by another, and also ensures&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 10px;">(2)&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 10px;">secure and&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 10px;">(3)&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 10px;">efficient communication:</span><div><span style="font-size: 10px;">(1) data format conversion; (2) data e</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 10px; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">ncryption/decryption; (3) data compression</span></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="324.31" y="97.67" width="393.69" height="36.22" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-38" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="278.41463414634154" y="73.70111111111103" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="73.88999999999996" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="JU9-KWcZjv8bku7d0i1C-39" value="<div><span style="font-size: 10px;">Provides â€‹network services directly to <b>end-user </b>applications, how?</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10px; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">User interface;&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 10px;">Specific rules (protocols) for different apps; Data semantics</span></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="323.68" y="56" width="393.69" height="36.22" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
